It is always painful to read this paper. At one point they say: "No threat can terrorise us, not even the shutting down of the institutions of higher learning" (Kein Drohmittel kann uns schrecken, auch nicht die Schliessung unserer HÃ¶chschule"). One week after writing this, three of the members of the group had been executed. They write as students, and the paper reminds me vividly those that I have so frequently find at the universities in the last forty years.
They probably know the real danger, but only reading this paper, the feeling we have is that they cannot imagine nothing worse than the shutting down of the faculties.
Great job with this page. I have recommended it to my contacts in Spain. Nowadays, language is not a problem, since with an automatic translator it is easy to follow it; but I guess that if there would be an English version will be better known outside Germany.
And "Die Weisse Rose" is not only a German exemple of dignity; but also a universal reference for freedom, intelligence, courage and humanity

Sieben Bewohner:innen des Altenheims werden durch diesen Anschlag ermordet. Alle Opfer waren Ãœberlebende der Shoa, die in Deutschland, im Land der TÃ¤ter:innen, 25 Jahre nach Ende der NS-Herrschaft ermordet werden.
Es handelt sich um einen der schwersten Angriffe auf JÃ¼dinnen:Juden im Nachkriegsdeutschland.
